summary: do you think there's room for both andi mack and the a girl to co-exist on Disney channel?
question: do you think there's room for both andi mack and the a girl to co-exist on Disney channel?
answer: Of course there is room for both to exist. It’s just a matter of whether or not Disney Channel is ready or willing to step up and continue changing the direction of their network, or whether they want to play it safe with slapstick sitcoms.

reblog.comment: Of course there is room for both to exist. It’s just a matter of whether or not Disney Channel is ready or willing to step up and continue changing the direction of their network, or whether they want to play it safe with slapstick sitcoms.

summary:
Andi: Date, marry, kill: me, Cyrus and Jonah. Go.
Buffy: Well... I guess date Jonah, marry you, kill TJ.
TJ: Come on, I wasn't...
body:
Andi: Date, marry, kill: me, Cyrus and Jonah. Go.

Buffy: Well… I guess date Jonah, marry you, kill TJ.

TJ: Come on, I wasn’t even an option!

summary: So I’ve been watching Derry Girls lately and after one of the characters came out as gay, the group started wearing rainbow pins...

summary: So the ship name is Tyrus and if you switch the y and the r it becomes Tryus which can be separated into Try Us which could be...

summary: I’m starting to think The A Girl wasn’t picked up because it seems like they weren’t invited to the Disney ball. Obviously this...
question: I’m starting to think The A Girl wasn’t picked up because it seems like they weren’t invited to the Disney ball. Obviously this is a far fetched assumption but also it’s been Months
answer:
You could be right, but the Disney ball really doesn’t mean much as far as the fate of the series goes.

For the sake of comparison: Andi Mack was ordered to pilot in November 2015. It wasn’t ordered to full series until August 2016, nearly 9 months later. It was filmed between September and December 2016, an entire year after the pilot was ordered and announced. It had been announced back in 2015 that Peyton was cast as Andi, but the rest of the cast weren’t confirmed until the launch party in September 2016.

The A Girl was green lit for pilot in October 2018. If it is picked up, there’s a good chance we won’t hear anything about it until well into summer, depending on when they want to start production. HSM: The Musical will finish production in June. Andi Mack’s third season will finish airing around July, most likely. Disney very well could be playing it by ear with these other series before committing to a third SLC based series. Who knows.

One thing that still points in a positive direction for the fate of the series is that Dora, who is by far the most active of the cast members, still has her role listed in her Instagram bio. I imagine that if they had confirmation that the series wasn’t going to be picked up, she would have removed that by now.

blog.name: gay-tyrus-trash
blog.title:
Skip that and I’m
GAY
blog.description:
🏳️‍🌈16y/o she/her bi🏳️‍🌈

Mostly Andi Mack and Druck

summary: Part 2
body:
✨Lemons and midnight conversations✨

Part 2

(TJ’s pov)


I almost felt dizzy, did I just come out to Cyrus?

I had only told one person before and that’s Amber. And she wasn’t that hard to tell because she came out to me like a year earlier so I knew she would support me. But the thought of telling anyone else was something I didn’t even want to think about. If anyone found out I would probably lost everything. My friends, the team and even my parents, they aren’t the most open minded people.


I didn’t want to look at Cyrus, what was he going to say? I mean he kind of came out to me like a moment ago so it would surprise me if he isn’t supportive but what if he wants to give revenge or something because I have been mean in the past and he tells the whole school?


I finally took courage to me and looked up at Cyrus. He looked a little surprised but, he had that beautiful smile again. Wow I need to stop focusing on his smile.


“Tj” Cyrus said with the softest voice I have heard. It was like all the fears I had a second ago just disappeared. Because of that voice.

“Tell me about him” he still had that soft comforting voice that made you feel like you were the most important person in the world.

“If you want to of course”

“It’s okay. His name was Reed, we met at summer camp two years ago. I don’t know why I liked him and the thought of liking him now low key makes me wanna puke” We both laughed a little. I didn’t feels as nervous anymore.

“I only had a crush on him for like a month or something so it wasn’t anything big. We still hang out even tho I mostly think he’s pretty annoying to be honest. But I don’t have any other friends than him and our "gang” so what could I do you know"


“Being a teen is hard. You have all these feeling you never felt before coming in, society tries to tell you that you’re not good enough if you aren’t a super trendy rich person with a bunch of friends, followers and likes, everyone kinda hates you for no reason basically just because you’re a teen and all teens are apparently spoiled little annoying bitches that never gives anything good to this world. Which sometimes can be true because teens can be annoying but that’s mostly because everything changes, everyone expect so much from you but at the same time don’t believe in you for a moment and you have all these hormones. And believe it or not but school can be hard too”

Cyrus almost had to catch his breath after that.

“Wow that was a long rant” I couldn’t help but laugh a little but I did agree but I had never thought about it like that before, I had always just kind of assumed that my parents were right when they said that my feelings were just a phase and that I was being overdramatic.

“I guess you’re right”


“I’m hungry” Cyrus said out of nowhere.

“Now?”

“What? I haven’t eaten anything in hours”

“You haven’t eaten dinner yet?”

“No I was at my horror movies meet up so I haven’t been home since this morning before school”

“Oh my god what the hell is a horror movies meet up?” I couldn’t help but laugh.

“It’s just like what it sounds like, a meet up to talk about horror movies” I was still laughing and I could see that Cyrus had a hard time holding it in too.

“What? It’s a normal thing”

“Yeah yeah I’m not judging”

“You’re judging”

“Nooo I just didn’t picture you ass a horror movie guy” Cyrus was now laughing too, and the glow in his eyes was back. I couldn’t help but smile, I felt more happy then I had been in a long time, and all just because of this little geeky horror movie nerd. Wow, not what I expected.



(Cyrus pov)


I did not expect TJ to be this fun to hang out with.

I just couldn’t stop smiling, it was something about him that just made me wanna protect him from everything and anything. I had never felt that before. Or of course I had felt like protecting people but not like this, not even with Jonah, Buffy or Andi. This was something way new. And it felt so happy and good in a way.


My thoughts kinda stopped because I felt that my stomach hurt, I was so hungry.

“Okay but can we pleeaasss eat now? I’m dying here”

“Where the hell are we supposed to get food now? It’s-” TJ got his phone out of his pocket to look at the time “9:07 pm”

“The store can’t be closed yet”

“okay sure we can go but only if we buy cheese puffs”

“Buy whatever you want I just need my muffin and I’m good”


We both started to climb down from the slide.

Then we started to head to the supermarket.

Part 2

(TJ’s pov)


I almost felt dizzy, did I just come out to Cyrus?

I had only told one person before and that’s Amber. And she wasn’t that hard to tell because she came out to me like a year earlier so I knew she would support me. But the thought of telling anyone else was something I didn’t even want to think about. If anyone found out I would probably lost everything. My friends, the team and even my parents, they aren’t the most open minded people.


I didn’t want to look at Cyrus, what was he going to say? I mean he kind of came out to me like a moment ago so it would surprise me if he isn’t supportive but what if he wants to give revenge or something because I have been mean in the past and he tells the whole school?


I finally took courage to me and looked up at Cyrus. He looked a little surprised but, he had that beautiful smile again. Wow I need to stop focusing on his smile.


“Tj” Cyrus said with the softest voice I have heard. It was like all the fears I had a second ago just disappeared. Because of that voice.

“Tell me about him” he still had that soft comforting voice that made you feel like you were the most important person in the world.

“If you want to of course”

“It’s okay. His name was Reed, we met at summer camp two years ago. I don’t know why I liked him and the thought of liking him now low key makes me wanna puke” We both laughed a little. I didn’t feels as nervous anymore.

“I only had a crush on him for like a month or something so it wasn’t anything big. We still hang out even tho I mostly think he’s pretty annoying to be honest. But I don’t have any other friends than him and our "gang” so what could I do you know"


“Being a teen is hard. You have all these feeling you never felt before coming in, society tries to tell you that you’re not good enough if you aren’t a super trendy rich person with a bunch of friends, followers and likes, everyone kinda hates you for no reason basically just because you’re a teen and all teens are apparently spoiled little annoying bitches that never gives anything good to this world. Which sometimes can be true because teens can be annoying but that’s mostly because everything changes, everyone expect so much from you but at the same time don’t believe in you for a moment and you have all these hormones. And believe it or not but school can be hard too”

Cyrus almost had to catch his breath after that.

“Wow that was a long rant” I couldn’t help but laugh a little but I did agree but I had never thought about it like that before, I had always just kind of assumed that my parents were right when they said that my feelings were just a phase and that I was being overdramatic.

“I guess you’re right”


“I’m hungry” Cyrus said out of nowhere.

“Now?”

“What? I haven’t eaten anything in hours”

“You haven’t eaten dinner yet?”

“No I was at my horror movies meet up so I haven’t been home since this morning before school”

“Oh my god what the hell is a horror movies meet up?” I couldn’t help but laugh.

“It’s just like what it sounds like, a meet up to talk about horror movies” I was still laughing and I could see that Cyrus had a hard time holding it in too.

“What? It’s a normal thing”

“Yeah yeah I’m not judging”

“You’re judging”

“Nooo I just didn’t picture you ass a horror movie guy” Cyrus was now laughing too, and the glow in his eyes was back. I couldn’t help but smile, I felt more happy then I had been in a long time, and all just because of this little geeky horror movie nerd. Wow, not what I expected.



(Cyrus pov)


I did not expect TJ to be this fun to hang out with.

I just couldn’t stop smiling, it was something about him that just made me wanna protect him from everything and anything. I had never felt that before. Or of course I had felt like protecting people but not like this, not even with Jonah, Buffy or Andi. This was something way new. And it felt so happy and good in a way.


My thoughts kinda stopped because I felt that my stomach hurt, I was so hungry.

“Okay but can we pleeaasss eat now? I’m dying here”

“Where the hell are we supposed to get food now? It’s-” TJ got his phone out of his pocket to look at the time “9:07 pm”

“The store can’t be closed yet”

“okay sure we can go but only if we buy cheese puffs”

“Buy whatever you want I just need my muffin and I’m good”


We both started to climb down from the slide.

Then we started to head to the supermarket.

blog.name: mackmeta
blog.title: Meta, Analysis, and Speculation
blog.description: I'm Dave (he/him). I'm a fan of Andi Mack, Riverdale, and Girl Meets World, and other shows and movies. Feel free to send me asks!

summary: I’m sorry if you’ve already been asked this but I’ve scrolled quite a bit and haven’t found anything super concrete except for...
question: I’m sorry if you’ve already been asked this but I’ve scrolled quite a bit and haven’t found anything super concrete except for excerpts here and there between other posts. But what are your Muffy predictions for the rest of season 3? I know they’ll probably end up together but what do you think the writers will do with them leading up to that point? Do you have any predictions for them if AM gets a season 4?
answer:
Actually anon, we know for a fact that they end up together thanks to a casting notice for 3x17 posted all the way back in October:

RACHEL Female, 13-16, Any Ethnicity, Marty’s girlfriend, Jealous when Marty runs into Buffy at the Bowling Alley. She questions whether or not Buffy and Marty have feelings for each other. Co-Star

Right after 3x17 comes the wedding in 3x18 and Marty is there so we know either at the bowling alley itself or soon afterwards Machel sinks and Muffy rises. So really their story is just getting together and then having some coupley moments after they canon. Basically we have: marathon in 3x14, bowling alley and jealous Rachel in 3x17, Marty as Buffy’s wedding date in 3x18, Buffy and Marty at the school when some pro or semi-pro basketball players visit in what’s most likely 3x20, and then Muffy at the house party in 3x21. One mystery for their story line is whether we’ll see a Muffy kiss, Garren has already hinted at it so we’ll see if it happens at some point.

I think the Muffy story line will probably be the most satisfying story line, ship related or not, that we’ll get in 3c as they’ll get ample screen time and the show can tell their story in text rather than subtext. It’s darkly funny to me that Marty happened to overlap so much with Ham as they were both in eps 14, 17, and 18 so Marty is likely to benefit with some longer cuts of his scenes in those eps. Which makes sense since Ham’s story line would have been largely tied to the wedding and Marty’s arc is structured to make sure he’s at the wedding. 

And it looks like the writers invented a completely new Muffy C plot for what’s likely to be 3x20 involving the basketball players visiting Jefferson which I’d guess is because Disney is really pushing Sofia as their next big star and the writers probably wanted to add a bit more depth to their arc since Garren could only be on set for so long while still being on GH. since 3x20 was probably Ham’s biggest ep since he was the only guest star that ep once again Garren benefits from Stoney’s arrest. Garren was on set for 9 confirmed days of filming, including the re-shoots, so we’re probably looking at something around 15 minutes give or take a few minutes of screen time for him in 3c spread out over 5 eps. Thanks to Stoney’s arrest and the re-shoots Marty probably ended up with around 4ish minutes more screentime than he would have originally gotten. 

In the unlikely event of a S4, Muffy would be a big winner. With Sofia’s star rising and with them having Garren available for the entire season we’d be looking at a lot more of them. Garren only returned in 3x10 but he still ended up with 7 eps in S3 which is almost as much as Luke’s 9 and in S4 he’d definitely have more eps than Luke so we’d probably be looking at something in the range of 9-11 Marty eps. They’d have to do something to give Marty depth but I have no idea what that would be though we can rule out panic attacks, learning disabilities, and family financial problems. There’d have to be some drama for them but the endgames have been locked in place for a while now so the show would struggle on that front since the audience won’t want to see them split up nor would any other new boy or girl be a plausible threat
